languages.text: Each of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g} reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.
languages.original_text: Каждая атака, совершаемая персонажем в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g} против целей, на которые действует эффект Выявление слабостей, снижает их {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} на 10.

traits.locale_text: Each of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of Expose Weakness reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，如果目标受到{g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}暴露弱点{/g}效果影响，则此次攻击会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}降低10点。
languages.original_text: Each of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g} reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.

languages.text: 使用者が弱点の露呈の効果を受けている敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行うごとに、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が-10減少する。
languages.original_text: Each of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of Expose Weakness reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が弱点の露呈の効果を受けている敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行うごとに、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}が-10減少する。

languages.text: Cada uno de los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del portador contra enemigos bajo el efecto de {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Exponer debilidad{/g} reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del enemigo en −10.
languages.original_text: Each of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g} reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.

traits.locale_text: Cada uno de los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del portador contra enemigos bajo el efecto de Exponer debilidad reducen la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} del enemigo en −10.

languages.text: Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Trägers gegen Feinde unter dem Einfluss von {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Schwäche offenlegen{/g} verringert {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Feindes um −10.
languages.original_text: Each of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g} reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.

traits.locale_text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} des Trägers gegen Feinde unter Einfluss des Effekts Schwäche offenlegen verringern {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Feindes um -10.

Die {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} des Trägers gegen Feinde unter dem Einfluss von Schwäche offenlegen verringern {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} des Feindes um −10.

languages.text: Chacune des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} que l'utilisateur lance contre des ennemis sous l'effet d'{g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Identification des points faibles{/g} réduit de −10 la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de sa cible.

traits.locale_text: Chacune des {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} que l'utilisateur lance contre des ennemis sous l'effet d'Identification des points faibles réduit de −10 la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} de sa cible.

languages.text: Giyen kişinin {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Zayıflığı İfşa Et{/g} kabiliyetinin etkisi altında olan düşmanlara karşı yaptığı her {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g}, düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliklerini 10 puan azaltır.
